body: I don't really understand but this seems wholesome enough

I realized that Fleet girl is such a Immortal, cuz she can still live for a many years than human and Will died if the inside part was broken/malfunction so they always has a Check-up Schedule,
And the appearance of still same as they Youth
Despite the horrid grammar, I feel cleansed reading this.

@Pururut You don't become a seasoned admiral over night and if you see a lot of combat odds are you're gonna collect some scars along the way. Also, "old guy", seriously? He looks at most like he might be in his mid to late 30s in the end, if you honestly think thats old you might be too young for this site. Of course being a shipgirl Jintsuu looks the same as ever since some authors treat shipgirls like actual ships which with proper maintenance can look the same as always for decades if not centuries.

Admiral (to be) : Umm, you're still wounded. You should get some rest, Jintsuu-san.
Jintsuu : SSEEEEXXXXXX~
Admiral (to be) : B-but your right eye's bleedin-.
Jintsuu : SSSSEEEEEEXXXXXXXX~

Joke aside, I can't make heads or tails of this one. Poor translation for sure.
This isnt the Jintsuu I know!
Just look at him, hes cool XD and his story is cool, I love all the Kan Musume
I like the story but didn't understand why the protagonist came back as a scarred old guy.

I appreciate the effort of the translator, but so much of it just sounds incorrect or off.

Not that I can complain, thanks anyway
